settings.text:
We offer free worldwide shipping with track and trace. Tracking information will be emailed to you upon payment confirmation. Items are dispatched within 1-3 business days.

Delivery date estimates are provided in good faith and should be considered as estimates only. Unceil cannot accept responsibility for delays, damages, or losses caused by third-party shipping partners or customs officials in your chosen shipping destination. We reserve the right to withhold delivery to any particular place or location at our sole discretion.

settings.title: TAX / CUSTOMS
settings.text: Please be advised that local taxes and import duties may apply and is not included in the shipping costs. The payable import taxes and duties are the responsibility of the customer. Please check with your local authorities to get an idea of any duties or taxes that may apply.

settings.title: DAMAGED ITEM
settings.text:
We do our best to ship your order in a safe and secure way. If your order for any reason or in any way arrives damaged, let us know straight away at hello@unceil.com. Please attach the photos of damage on item(s) with your order number. We will dispatch a replacement or give you a full refund on item(s) shipped back within 14 days.

For authentication reason, we always ask you to return any damaged item(s).

  1. Fill in the RETURN FORM entirely, including the reason for your return.
  2. Place the Return Form with the damaged item(s) in a suitable and protected box., e.g. the one you got from Unceil.
  3. Save a proof of postage until we have confirmed that the item(s) are received.

If you have any questions concerning delivery, please reach out at hello@unceil.com. We always strive to get back to you within 2 business days.
Questions? Send us an email or contact us.
